content.prompt: Which of the following best describes how the break between the two stanzas affects the poem’s narrative?

choices.label: It marks the transition to a new point in the narrative after a lapse of time.
It marks the transition to the retelling of the same story from a different perspective.
It separates the main narrative from a flashback that relates an episode from Don Miguel’s past.
It separates the main narrative from an episode foreshadowing the destruction of the two trees.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe how plot orders events in a narrative.
